resources.string: First, I am going to ask you to verify some information for me and answer some questions.
After you\'re finished, press this button to move on.
What is your highest level of education?
Without looking at a calendar, type TODAY\'s date
What day of the week is it?
What season of the year is it?

You will be presented with a list of words one at a time. Read and listen to each word carefully and try to remember it. Once the list is complete, you will be asked to recall as many words as you can remember. It does not matter in what order you recall them. Just try to remember as many as you can.
Press the button below when you are ready to start.
Now type in all the words you can remember. Just try to your best to recall as many as you can.
Please select the correct name for each object as quickly as you can.
You will now be shown a series of figures. You will have 10 seconds to study each figure so that you can remember them later.

string-array.name: figure_prompt_array
string-array.item: Here is the 1st figure, you will have 6 seconds to study it.
Here is the 2nd figure, you will have 10 seconds to study it.
You will now be shown four figures on the screen at once. Select the correct figure that you have seen before.

resources.string: Select the correct figure that you have seen before.
